original_title: PFL Playoffs 2021 - PFL 7: Cooper III vs MacDonald
overview: The PFL 7 mixed martial arts event for the 2021 season of the Professional Fighters League was held on August 13, 2021. This was the start of the playoffs for the Welterweight and Lightweight divisions. This event aired on ESPN2, with the prelims on ESPN+.
title: PFL Playoffs 2021 - PFL 7: Cooper III vs MacDonald
